about.title: About Me
about.text:
<3>Hey! I'm Carlos Curiel, </3> a former psychotherapist and music therapist turned <1>web developer </1>, with a deep interest in human behavior and a passion for building useful, meaningful digital experiences.

For years, I dedicated myself to helping people understand and transform their lives through psychology, working closely with individuals in therapeutic contexts. That background has given me a strong foundation in empathy, active listening, and problem-solving – skills I now channel into tech.

At some point, I realized I wanted to explore another way to solve problems: through code. I joined a full-time web development bootcamp, where I learned to build full-stack applications using <2>JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, and SQL.</2> It was like therapy – but for the web.

I’m especially drawn to frontend development and the logic behind it, I also enjoy creating clean, accessible UIs. I’ve worked on projects like a rental management platform  and a responsive CV site built with Vite.

<2>Right now, I’m focused on improving my skills, contributing to open-source projects, and looking for my first opportunity in tech.</2>

 I'm driven by curiosity, discipline, and a love for turning abstract ideas into real, interactive products.

Thanks for reading – feel free to check out my projects!
